content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ it s that time of year again when the bees are buzzing and the flowers are about to bloom or at least for some of us we are dreaming of summer this unique use of filet hexagons creates a honeycomb look for a cool and wearable crochet summer top this pattern is worked as one piece from bottom up and in row if a longer length is desired add one more repeat on the body portion a trim is added and at the same time buttonholes are created for the front **»> pattern pack discounts <<< use code save10 for 10% off two patterns save15 for 15% off 3 patterns save20 for 20% off 4 or more patterns cannot be combined with other offers ** supplies 2 75 mm c hook 1 or size to obtain gauge yarn needle 2 scissors 3 7-9 buttons 3/8 to 1/2 inch 4 yarn the original yarn used for this is labeled as dk weight and is no longer available however when swatched it matches fingering weight yarns if substituting i recommend using a fingering weight sizes small 32-34 bust 81-87 cm medium 36-38 bust 91-97 cm large 40-42 bust 102-107 cm 1x 44-46 bust 112-117 cm 2x 48-50 bust 123-51 cm 3x 52-54 bust 131-137 cm this patterned fabric has a stretch/ease to it the measurements of the crochet fabric are actual bust measurements for a fitted garment without extra built-in ease yardage small 710 yards 650 m medium 810 yards 740 m large 980 yards 896 m 1x 1100 yards 1005 m 2x 1300 yards 1189 m 3x 1500 yards 1372 m a stacked single_crochet is made at the beginning of each row instead of chaining the stacked single_crochet counts as a double_crochet stitch the same stitch is modified for the decreases replacing the beginning chain with this method creates cleaner lines along the garment it is helpful to place a marker at the beginning of each row to mark the first stitch see blog post for more info https //brianakdesigns com/stacked-single-crochet/ 6 © 2020 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and no shipping charge the pattern will be available for download as soon as payment processes if you have trouble downloading the file please message me you are welcome to sell finished items all
